title: I keep getting random corruption detected, it fixes then I get another problem a couple games later
body:
it fixes then I get another problem a couple games later, This is the error I found in the logs

001235.881|  ERROR| Data corruption detected. WadFile chunk verification failed: Plugins\rcp-be-lol-game-data\default-assets.wad chunk 17922954200492957019

Any Riot members?

replies.body: Some errors are fairly normal in certain logs. What specific issue are you experiencing outside of the logs that caused you to take a look at this line?

Well my game keeps crashing in loading then it says "Possible data corruption detected" Then it repairs the problem and loads in game. It is usually fine for a couple games then it happens again. Very Annoying

I decided to look in the logs searching for the word, "corrupt" and I found this. and it is right before it repairs my client

Hmm.. I'd double-check that you've installed League to the default directory (C:\Riot Games\League of Legends) and that you're running League as admin (right-click, *run as administrator*). You'll also want to ensure you've [**configured your Network Firewall**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#wq3) with some exceptions to let League through it or disable your Firewall entirely while playing League. Without any one of these configurations being completed properly, you could run into endless corruptions in the League directory.

Let me know if you have any questions.
